nodes.text: Keyorin, also known as the Hunter's World, was a common destination for retired or semi-retired smugglers seeking second careers as entrepreneurs or bank-rollers of those who still flew. Smugglers who decided it was time to go dirtside but couldn't bear getting out of the game sometimes ended up on this planet. The most respected such retiree was typically given informal rule over Keyorin, and known as the Boss. Boss Tinketh Fo controlled the planet as of 4 ABY. Alas, retirement rarely meant escaping from one's past indiscretions, due to the many available bounties which earned Keyorin its nickname.
Keyorin could be identified as the planet in which Invitation Only took place by some Aurebesh writing on a wall on the first panel that reads "KEYORIN PORT".
